name: Dino Shooter
description:
Dino Shooter is classic bubble shooter game, exquisite picture quality, fun levels, no wifi, free, best time to pass the game!

Welcome to the happy life of a ancient boy, cute dinosaur babies hiding in the depths of bubble jungle, slide your fingers, eliminate colored bubbles, pop, pop, look, baby dinosaurs were you found.

How to play:
- Aim and match the bubble you want to shoot in the bubble.
- Match 3 or more same bubbles.
- Remove bubbles to find cute baby dinosaurs.
- Click on the boosters in the game, the use of boosters allows you to easily through the game
- The game will give you the stars based on your performance in the game, the higher the score the more stars
feature:
+ High quality and good music
+ No wifi can play
+ Completely free
+ Well designed levels

You can download it for free for your kids or girlfriends or old parents.
I wish you a happy spend time here!
